name: Soaring Poppet
summary: Your construction has flaps of cloth or wicker that can keep you aloft.
description:
Your construction has flaps of cloth or wicker that can keep you aloft. You gain a fly Speed of 15 feet.Traits

Poppet: Small constructs originally designed to serve as companions or servants. They occasionally gain a greater spark of life, transforming them into independent, sapient creatures.
